price: 15. (Allah) berfirman, “Jangan takut (mereka tidak akan dapat membunuhmu)! Maka pergilah kamu berdua dengan membawa ayat-ayat Kami (mukjizat-mukjizat); sungguh, Kami bersamamu mendengarkan (apa yang mereka katakan),
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّاۖ فَٱذۡهَبَا بِـَٔايَٰتِنَآۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسۡتَمِعُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā fa-idh'habā biāyātinā innā maʿakum mus'tamiʿūna
